receptionist.NO_TOPIC: Hi <detective>, we're glad to see you. There's been a murder in the Ron Cooke Hub, <victim>'s dead. Sorry we didn't check to see how he died, thought it would be more fun for you to find out...

states.description: Talk to main hall receptionist
states.title: Intro

states.description: Nobody in kitchen. Find everybody's meal orders. They all have burger, apart from pablo who had falafel.
states.title: Explore kitchen

receptionist.CCTV: We only have footagee from inside the lecture theatre, and it's just a video of <char1> pacing around. I hope that's useful.

states.description: Talk to Recpetionist about the CCTV footage.
states.title: Inspect Reception

char1.NO_TOPIC: Hello <detective>, can I help you with anything?

states.description: Bond explains that he was meeting the Queen. They had a conversation about Brexit. Apparently Buckingham Palace is getting renovated and they were discussing interior decorating.
states.title: Question Bond

states.description: You find some catering notes lying around, on it is a note saying "Dumbledore needs to speak to the chef".
states.title: Find catering notes

states.description: There are two sets of footprints where James Bond was in the CCTV. That's suspicious.
states.title: Inspect lecture theatre

char4.general: Actually I did notice something fishy going on, I heard some people talking up on the balcony but get this - they weren't even famous! I know right, don't know what that's all about.

states.description: You meet Trump who says he heard non-famous voices coming from the balcony - is very worried he may have to talk to somebody with no influence.
states.title: Inspect bin store

states.description: You find a wanted poster with a picture of Pablo on.
states.title: Find wanted poster in bins

states.description: You find a ripped piece of Freddy Mercury's clothing.
states.title: Find Mercury's clothing

states.description: Nobody is around. You find an epipen with "Deliver in case of gluten ingestion" written on the side.
states.title: Inspect stairwell

char6.NO_TOPIC: Hello <detective>, can I assist you with anything?
char6.general: Nothing particularly exciting has happened, <char2> has been a bit stony this evening, hasn't spoken much and is just a bit boring.

states.description: Find Marilyn Monroe. She mentions that the queen has been the least talkative and quite emotionless and boring.
states.title: Inspect common room

char5.NO_TOPIC: Hey <detective>, what can I do for you?
char5.clothes: Oh that's mine yeah, I think that's a bit of my jeans. Must have done it dancing with <victim> earlier on.

states.description: Mercury says his ripped clothes were because he was dancing too hard.
states.title: Talk to Mercury about clothing

states.description: You find a bloody dagger lying under a chair.
states.title: Find a bloody dagger

char3.cooking: You think I'm the killer? Because of that? HAHAHAHAHA don't quit your day job my friend, I just appreciate good food.

states.description: Go to the balcony. Dumbledore says that he is an aspiring chef, he mentioned this to the receptionist who made a note to say that the chef should talk to him.
states.title: Talk to Dumbledore about suspicions

states.description: Find a walkie talkie on the balcony inside a flower pot (or something inconspicuous).
states.title: Inspect balcony

char2.CCTV: Well I was in the middle of a conversation with <char1> actually, I'll be honest they do like to chatter...

states.description: Talk to Queen and ask her where she was at time of death. She says she was with Bond talking about things.
states.title: Inspect island

states.description: You find a small rune-bound book on the floor. Inside are some very exotic sounding recipes and Dumbledore's name is incribed on the inside cover.
states.title: Find Dumbledore's Cookbook

states.description: Nobody is there but there's a montage of Freddy Mercury dancing his tits off.
states.title: Inspect 360 room

char2.NO_TOPIC: Hi how is the detective work coming along?
char2.clothes: Well before the murder I'm fairly sure all <char5>'s clothes were in tact. How curious...

states.description: Ask the Queen what she thinks about Mercury's ripped clothes, she says she saw his clothes all in order before the murder...
states.title: Talk to Queen about Mercury's clothes

char2.NO_TOPIC: Hello detective, do you need a hand with anything?

states.description: Says that it's a shame about Pablo, says she had a long, deep conversation with him about all the wonderful things he did for the people of Columbia and for cocaine as an industry.
states.title: Talk to Queen

receptionist.allergy: Oh that's <victim>'s, maybe they dropped it. They asked for a gluten-free meal but we just thought they were a bit of a hipster.

states.description: Ask them about the epipens. They explain he wanted a gluten-free meal, thought he was just a hipster.
states.title: Talk to Receptionist about Dinner
